ingredients.ingredient: 1 bunch broccoli rabe, trimmed and rinsed
Â¼ teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes

cookingTips: Blanch broccoli rabe briefly before grilling to partially cook and tenderize
Use a grill basket or skewer lengthwise to prevent pieces from falling through grates
The slight charring enhances the natural bitterness of broccoli rabe
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Why is broccoli rabe more bitter than regular broccoli? How does grilling and charring affect its flavor profile?
